feed.rights: All content written by Jeff Rush
feed.generator: Generated from Org-mode source code using lazyblorg which is written in Python. Industrial-strength technology, baby.

div.p: Isn't the date the issue was closed enough?

ul.li: [ ] If can't find something in one entry, it flows over into the next one
[ ] why ust I have a LOGBOOK when CLOSED holds the timestamp it is finished?
[ ] so why do I need a CREATED property?
[ ] why not default the ID to the timestamp of when it was closed + the title?
[ ] need a hotkey to regenerate the blog!

div.p: This is an introduction text which describes the blog entry with some catchy information. Readers should be convinced to read this interesting text. Memacs is an external link to Memacs.
